sentences.sContent: I think we have found a niche in the toy market.
sentences.sCn: 我认为我们已经在玩具市场找到了领地。

trans.tranCn: 壁龛； 【生】 生态龛； 特定市场
trans.tranOther: an opportunity to sell a product or service to a particular group of people who have similar needs, interests etc
